officialTitle: Rectal Misoprostol as a Hemostatic Agent During Abdominal Myomectomy
genderDescription: Patient must have a uterus to participate
inclusionCriteria:
* Female age 20-50 y/o who plan to undergo abdominal myomectomy for symptomatic myomatous uterus
* Must be FEMALE
* Must have minimum age of 20 Years
* Must have maximum age of 50 Years
exclusionCriteria: * Patient with contraindication to misoprostol or vasopressin, personal history or cardiac or pulmonary disease, history of prior myomectomy
